As it floats aimlessly through the dungeon, it builds up an electric charge, which it will occasionally discharge in your direction. ---- “I had rather be a toad,
And live upon the vapour of a dungeon,
Than keep a corner in the thing I love
For others’ uses.”
-William Shakespeare, _Othello_, III, 3. 1603.}} ==Useful Info== '''Vapours''' are essentially pockets of very bad weather. They are naturally [[invisible]] and permanently [[confused]], spending most of their time moving randomly. Every so often, however, they'll fire off a bolt of lightning, dealing [[electricity]] damage to anything that happens to be in its way. Due to their invisibility, a random lightning bolt out of a seemingly clear space is the first clue you'll have that they're around. They are normally only found in [[the Swamp]], the [[Cloud Mages' Chambers]], or certain [[vault]]s, but may be summoned by drawing the [[Foxfire card]]. ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number= |slot1=[[Lightning Bolt]] (3d16) |slot2=[[Lightning Bolt]] (3d16) |slot3=[[Melee spell|Melee]] |slot4=[[Lightning Bolt]] (3d16) |slot5=''none'' |slot6=''none'' }} {{clear}} ==Tips & Tricks== *rElec takes almost all of the risk out of dealing with them. ==History== Vapours were removed in [[0.15]].
